traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Mortlock can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Mortlock makes two attacks with his greatclub.

actions.name: Greatclub
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 (2d4 damage) bludgeoning damage if Mortlock has taken any damage since his last turn.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
